bill.summary:
Cybersecurity Disclosure Act of 2019
This bill directs the Securities and Exchange Commission to issue final rules requiring a registered issuer to
disclose in its mandatory annual report or annual proxy statement whether any member of its governing body has expertise or experience in cybersecurity; and if no member has such expertise or experience, describe what other company cybersecurity aspects were taken into account by the persons responsible for identifying and evaluating nominees for the governing body.
